entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
